description: Navigate to BNI - Regional Office. Follow the narrow paved alleyway straight ahead, keeping the stone wall and vendors on the left. Pass the 'Babakan Ciamis' guard post on the right, continuing alongside the fence. The tall BNI Regional Office building is prominent on the right side throughout the path.
agent_concise_description: Follow the narrow paved alleyway straight ahead, keeping the stone wall and vendors on the left. Pass the 'Babakan Ciamis' guard post on the right, continuing alongside the fence. The tall BNI Regional Office building is prominent on the right side throughout the path.
